block.p: SIEGEL-Phyllis. On September 5th, 2000. Beloved wife of Sam, mother of Marsha and Gary Kressin, Sharon and David Carr, Siew and Yongsuk Lertratanakul, grandmother of Brian and Deena Kressin, David Kressin, Vanessa and Gregg Botelho, Claudia Carr and Marc Richardson, Michael Carr and Jamie Carr, Jeera and Apinya Lertratanakul, sister of Henry Coretz, Irving Coretz and Esther Eisenstein. Services Thursday, 2 PM, at ''The Riverside,'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
